title: Stranger Things
info: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

title: The Iron Giant
info: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: Interstellar
info: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Matrix
info: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Shining
info: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past

title: The Dark Knight
info: The Joker emerges, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Inception
info: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Taken
info: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: Justice League
info: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
info: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

title: Black Mirror
info: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

title: The Mask
info: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: The Hangover
info: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

title: Zombieland
info: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the last Twinkie, and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.

title: Proyect X
info: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.

title: How To Get Away With Murder
info: A group of ambitious law students and their brilliant criminal defense professor become involved in a twisted murder plot that promises to change the course of their lives.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
info: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.
